mapper.sql: WID, TYPE, NAME, YHID, STARTTIME, ENDTIME, TIME, AUDITORS, TaskStatus, CONTENT, STATUS, CreateTime, CreateBy, UpdateTime, UpdateBy
A.WID, A.TYPE, A.NAME, A.YHID, A.STARTTIME, A.ENDTIME, A.TIME, A.AUDITORS, A.TaskStatus, A.CONTENT, A.STATUS, A.CreateTime, A.CreateBy, A.UpdateTime, A.UpdateBy
mapper.select: select ,B.NAME AS USERNAME,C.LBMC AS typeDisplayvalue from t_contract_user_leaveinfo A LEFT JOIN T_CONTRACT_USER_USERINFO B ON A.YHID=B.WID AND B.STATUS=1 LEFT JOIN T_CONTRACT_SJZD_QJLX C ON A.TYPE=C.LBDM and C.STATUS=1 where A.YHID = #{yhid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.STATUS=1 ORDER BY A.CREATETIME DESC
mapper.insert: insert into t_contract_user_leaveinfo (WID, TYPE, NAME, YHID, STARTTIME, ENDTIME, TIME, AUDITORS, TaskStatus, CONTENT, STATUS, CreateTime, CreateBy, UpdateTime, UpdateBy ) values (#{wid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{yhid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{starttime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{endtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{time,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{auditors,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taskstatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createby,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateby,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

mapper.update:
update t_contract_user_leaveinfo
TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
YHID = #{yhid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STARTTIME = #{starttime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ENDTIME = #{endtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TIME = #{time,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
AUDITORS = #{auditors,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TaskStatus = #{taskstatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONTENT = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CreateTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CreateBy = #{createby,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UpdateTime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UpdateBy = #{updateby,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where WID = #{wid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update t_contract_user_leaveinfo set TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, YHID = #{yhid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STARTTIME = #{starttime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ENDTIME = #{endtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TIME = #{time,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, AUDITORS = #{auditors,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TaskStatus = #{taskstatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONTENT = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CreateTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CreateBy = #{createby,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UpdateTime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UpdateBy = #{updateby,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where WID = #{wid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
